values: To flank is to be positioned at the side of something or someone.
The mayor entered the room flanked by her advisers.
n.侧面,侧腹,侧边,侧翼vt.位于…之侧面,侧面有,守侧面,攻击侧面vi.侧面与…相接adv.在左右两边
